attributes.action: Declare peace between Human Being and Fish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Americans believe that Human Being and Fish can co-exist peacefully (G.W. Bush, Sept. 29, 2000). We the undersigned beleive the United Kingdom have a obligation to do our best to unite with our ocean brothers.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
